# EmphasizeAction.EmphasisAnimationStyle

**Enumeration**

Options available to determine the kinds of animation timing.

## Declaration

```swift
enum EmphasisAnimationStyle
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/EmphasizeAction] structure accepts this enumeration as an initializer argument.

## Enumeration Cases

- **EmphasizeAction.EmphasisAnimationStyle.basic**: Animates with steady motion.
- **EmphasizeAction.EmphasisAnimationStyle.playful**: Animates with whimsical motion.
- **EmphasizeAction.EmphasisAnimationStyle.wild**: Animates with sporadic motion.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
